title: Purse, "Purse with Egyptian ornament", ca. 1880
signed: "14" and a trident symbol of Sloan & Company are stamped on inside of purse frame; below them "Black, Starr & Frost" is stamped.
dimensions:
19.5 L (including ring and chain) x 7.5 W x 1.2 D cm
(7 11/16 x 2 15/16 x 1/2 in. )
creditline: Gift of Frederick Saal in honor of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph Saal
description: Small mesh purse with Egyptian revival motifs, including a winged, turquoise scarab beneath clasp, applied wire work and beading along frame, and four small pendants suspended from purse bottom.

participants.person_name: Black, Starr and Frost Co., New York

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, "Purse with Egyptian ornament", ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. Gold mesh, turquoise. Gift of Frederick Saal in honor of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph Saal. 1991-160-9.
